events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, showing strong enthusiasm for our development team.
Application reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software developer and coding skills.
Assigned recruiter Jane Smith to manage this software engineer candidate throughout the interview process.
Candidate responded well during the initial screening call, demonstrating good knowledge of software engineering principles.
Received confirmation from the candidate that they are available for the technical interview next week.
Scheduled a technical interview with the lead developer for May 10th to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with their proficiency in software development.
HR interview scheduled for May 15th to discuss cultural fit and benefits with the candidate.
Candidate had a positive HR interview, showing alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the role.
A formal offer has been presented to the candidate reflecting competitive salary and benefits.
Candidate has accepted the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team next month.
The onboarding process is underway with the candidate completing all required training and setup.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering department.
